app.name: Industrial Ethernet
app.description:
U-Phy Device Application
This application shows how to implement Industrial Ethernet connectivity using the U-Phy middleware. Currently Profinet Device and Ethernet/IP Adapter is supported.

The example implements a basic I/O device connecting inputs and outputs to to the EVK buttons and LEDs. Profinet GSDML and EtherNet/IP EDS files are found in the project folder.

After building and programming the example, the EVK can be connected to a Profinet or Ethernet/IP network for evaluation.

RT-Labs U-Phy middleware enables Industrial Ethernet connectivity for Infineon microcontrollers. Key features:
  • Profinet, EtherNet/IP, Modbus support
  • Define process data and device characteristics using U-Phy Device Builder
  • Build time generation of GSDML, EDS and device specific code
  • U-Phy Middleware - U-Phy MTB Middleware on Github
  • U-Phy - General introduction to U-Phy concept and features
